name: audit-log-query-parameters
description: Parameters for querying audit log records, either by target device/object or by source device/object.

options.name: by-target

fields.name: target-device-identifier
fields.description: The device identifier of the target device.

fields.name: target-device-address
fields.description: The network address of the target device.

fields.name: target-object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier on the target device.

fields.name: target-property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier on the target object.

fields.name: target-array-index
fields.description: The array index of the target property.

fields.name: target-priority
fields.description: The priority level of the operation (1-16).

fields.name: operations
fields.description: Bit flags specifying which operation types to include.

fields.name: successful-actions-only
fields.description: Filter for successful or failed operations.

options.description: Query audit log records based on the target device and object.

options.name: by-source

fields.name: source-device-identifier
fields.description: The device identifier of the source device.

fields.name: source-device-address
fields.description: The network address of the source device.

fields.name: source-object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier on the source device.

fields.name: operations
fields.description: Bit flags specifying which operation types to include.

fields.name: successful-actions-only
fields.description: Filter for successful or failed operations.

options.description: Query audit log records based on the source device and object.
